title: UPDATE: January calendar pretty well finished
body: MY KID COULD PAINT THAT MARGOT AT THE WEDDING I'M NOT THERE THE SAVAGES SOUTHLAND TALES HEIMA: SIGUR ROS 01/02 - MY KID COULD PAINT THAT / MARGOT AT THE WEDDING 01/09 - MARGOT AT THE WEDDING / I'M NOT THERE 01/16 - I'M NOT THERE / THE SAVAGES 01/23 - THE SAVAGES / SOUTHLAND TALES 01/26 - HEIMA: SIGUR ROS @ The Belmonte Calendar will be online shortly!
author: Dan

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
One question:

Southland Tales: why? With all of the big fish in the sea, you choose Southland Tales.

also, Southland tales, as bad as it is, it really does need to be witnessed to be believed.
